You've never done it before, and even though this is a controlled environment, you can't help but feel that you're giving up your ability to control the situation, even though Julia is the only other person in the room, and she is in no position to affect anything. Your lie asleep in Carla's grand canyon for two hours. Sleep has also captured Carla but she is awake when you open your eyes and she greets you with a soft, husky "hi". "Hi" is all you can muster in a voice as small as you are. Beaming, she stares at you with a loving look enjoying the moment for a minute or two before she takes you in hand.

Leaving the couch she heads for the alcove and brings you to the smallest door, bending down gently to place you on the ground. As she rises you are taken by her grandeur and still taken aback as her face disappears high above you. The ground shakes as she steps away; this behemoth of a woman who has become your lover.

A bath and shower and new clothes are the order of business now and an hour later, refreshed, you find Carla once again in the kitchen.

Using the elevator that Ben has installed, you quickly rise to the top of the counter to find that Carla has set a place for you. Without saying a word she places your lunch in front of you which you ravenously devour. You've already consumed nearly all of it before she even sets herself down.

"You know" you begin "for a person who doesn't like being a giantess" your voice trails off as you search for words. Looking down, as if almost ashamed "you really, you really... I don't know what to say." Carla laughs and you wonder if she just finds you funny or is enjoying watching you stumble over your words.

"Well Brian, I never said I HATED being a giantess. I just said that I found it, you know." "No" you say, shaking your head, "I don't know."

"Well" speaking ever so softly and sexily "let's just say...that with the right man it has its moments." Broadly smiling now she has finished her lunch and stands, once again towering over you. Reaching in she removes your setting, deciding that you are done with lunch. After placing the dishes and cutlery in the dishwasher she turns back to you.

"So, you wanna play a game." You wonder, where have you heard that before?
1112121122112111121112211111111122.title: Shower and Lunch

11121211221121111211122111111111221.content:
"Do I wanna play a game" you think to yourself as your giant ladyfriend stands before you. As you think of what she has in store for you she repeats her question. "Do you wanna play a game?"

"A game" you reply in an answer that will surely be remembered in the lame answer hall of fame. "Yes, a game. We could play" she continues speaking, drawing out her words ever so sexily and slowly. "We could play Parcheesi, or Monopoly, or Boggle or, we could have some fun and make up a game."

Your quizzical look is answered with a response and an explanation.
11121211221121111211122111111111221.title: Shall We Play A Game?

choices: You And Carla Hit The Beach.
111212112211211112111221111111112211.content:
"With little people I like to play games. When Ben died I became really depressed. I drew into myself and was really a zombie for a few months.

I never told anyone this but one night I had a thought. How bad would it be if I rented a couple of tiny people and had my own little party. Anyway, I got this couple here and pretended that I was a goddess to be worshipped. That their sole aim in life was to pleasure me and that their lives would be ended if they didn't please me. I had so much fun I had to pay a late charge when I returned them. After that whenever I was in the mood, I would, you know, rent some little people.
I had all kinds of fun.

When you came here the other day I just figured you'd be here until Sarah came back and took you. I...I...I...I never thought anything would happen. Never even gave it a thought. But you looked so sweet and you were so nice." Leaning in to you now she keeps talking. You are mesmerized by every word.

"Brian, since Ben there's been no one. No one for real anyway. I know it may be crazy. You're so little and I'm so big...but do you think we could try to..." You look up in her eyes as their gentle gaze caresses you and speak.

"Carla, I...the last couple of days have been heaven here. When I shrank I never even imagined being with someone. When I saw that giant cleaning lady my hair stood on end" you say as you both laugh. "Then Sarah and then you. But you were so nice. So sweet and kind and gentle. And so beautiful and wonderful in a million ways. I don't know what tomorrow brings but I like to give us a try. If that's what you want."

Carla smiles and gently kisses you on the top of your head. Beaming she stands up and informs you that it is time for a game. She picks you up and deposits you at the alcove where she informs you that she'll be back in a few minutes and that you should wait for her. You do as you are told and about 10 minutes later a bell rings and you answer it. As you approach the door you see Carla, all 50 feet of her decked out in a Girl Scout uniform.

"Good afternoon sir may I interest you in some Girl Scout cookies " she says. You want to burst out in laughter but you think better of it and play along.

"Well I guess I could use a box."

"Only a box sir? You know we depend on the cookie sales to run our programs sir."

"Well, a box is all I need. I don't eat a lot of sweets."

Placing her hands on her hips she leans in a bit and gives you a glaring look.

"You should know sir that this is very important to me. My girlfriend Desiree she suggested some new sales techniques to me. She told me that she got so mad at one lady that she accidentally stepped on her and snapped both her legs right off."

"Did I say a box. How about 100 boxes. That's what I meant."

"Very good sir. We have a bonus for large purchases " she says as she leans down and plucks you up. Opening the top two buttons of her shirt she drops you inside and you are soon swimming in her river of cleavage. The light fades as she rebuttons the shirt. Now this is a game I could get used to you think to yourself.
111212112211211112111221111111112211.title: Girls Will Be Girl Scouts.

1112121122112111121112211111111122112.content:
Secreted in Carla's bosom you chuckle to yourself. A Girl Scout? How funny is this. Well, maybe not so funny you reckon when she's 50 feet tall and threatens in a roundabout way to snap off your legs. But things are about to get more bizarre.

As Carla walks through the house you feel her going down the steps to the basement. In your self guided tour of the house you had passed on the basement and are now wondering what it looks like. Soon after you arrive in the basement Carla begins to unbutton her shirt. You are soon hoisted out by your shirt collar. Now the new fun begins.

"In order to earn my next merit badge, in human anatomy, there are several tests I must perform. You were so nice I thought you wouldn't mind a few simple tests. Please remove your clothes."

As you remove you clothes you look around and notice that you are on the top of what must have been her husband's work space. There are tools of all sorts hanging on the wall and just about everything you might need to complete any task.

Without your noticing Carla reaches to the far corner of the table top and grabs a wooden object. The object consists of two pieces of wood, with a thick base and a round thin piece of wood erupting from it to a height of about a foot. Without warning your hands are suddenly tied to metallic device that fits over the thin piece of wood. The metal object fits like a ring and from what you can see it can be slid up and down the wood as Carla wishes. Next your legs are separated and each foot is tied to a metal peg that is then inserted into a hole in the base.
The metal ring is then adjusted so that your body is stretched out to a taut, almost uncomfortable position.

With the earnestness of a real Girl Scout Carla takes some measurements of your body. Your head, torso and legs and then the fun begins.

"Well sir, I am afraid the next round of experiments can be a bit uncomfortable as she extends her index finger, its nail painted a bright red, toward your scrotum. Running the nail down the leg she picks up a microcassette recorder and begins recording her data.

"Test subject's nerves are quite good. Subject responded very well to leg stimuli." She continues to run her nail all over your body and after a minute or so it comes to rest under your scrotum. Gently, at first, she lifts your sack up and allows it to drop. All along she continues to record her information. Suddenly she removes the nail and begins to lick your naked body. Your hard on, is now raging as she continues to lick you everywhere, her hot breath causing you to nearly go insane with desire. And then she pulls away.

"What's this sir" she asks as she looks directly at your engorged penis. "My mother warned me to be careful with my test subjects. She was right. How dare you take advantage of a little girl." With tape she covers your mouth and you unable to utter a protest. With her little finger she flicks you in the balls and your whole body jerks in pain. Lifting up the ring, she stretches you out, causing severe discomfort.

"I think a time out is in order to give you a chance to think about what you have done." Helpless you are left on the table as she turns and leaves the basement.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112.title: A Merit Badge For Carla.

11121211221121111211122111111111221121.content:
The door to the basement slams and you are all alone. What was going to be a week or so in the sun has turned into something completely different. You are now eight and a half inches tall, the guest (prisoner?) of a giant sexy woman and really starting to question your sense of judgment.

Staring up at your hands which are bound to the metal ring, you laugh at your situation which might really be funny except that parts of your body are really begin to ache.

The pain from your scrotum has subsided and you console yourself by rationalizing that had she really wanted to hurt you she would have hit you much harder and more than once. Yeah, it really was a love tap.

Love tap or not the seconds pass and are starting to seen like minutes and the minutes like an eternity. Getting yourself out of this mess is not an option. A good Girl Scout, she has tied you up real well.

After what seems like forever you hear the door open but because your back is to the stairs you can't see Carla, or even if it's Carla, as she makes her way down the stairs. You sense her getting closer and then the footsteps stop. Your level of anxiety starts to rise and you wonder what is going on. For about a minute she just stands there. Finally she steps forward and runs her fingernail down your back.

"Have you learned your lesson" she says in that low, soft voice which itself is a turn-on. You shake your head vigorously up and down and she responds "good".

Your bonds are swiftly cut and she catches you as you fall to the ground. Looking up her beret is more prominent on her head now and you can't help but notice how similar she looks to another beret wearer who interned in the White House. Only Carla is prettier and far bustier than Monica.

"Do you think I've earned my merit badge" she asks you. Nervously you shake your head looking for a sign that this "game" is about end. Your approval of her work is met with a smile and she picks you up and carries you out of the basement and back to the alcove. She places you on the ground and stretches to her full height. Grabbing her pad where she had left it she writes something down and begins to talk.

"Your cookies will be here in two weeks sir. And...I expect cash upon delivery. If I were you, I wouldn't disappoint me." Turning on heel, she walks away as you withdraw into the alcove to rest and think.
11121211221121111211122111111111221121.title: Game's Over. Carla Wins.

111212112211211112111221111111112211212.content:
The alcove represents, to you, privacy, security, peace of mind, safety, and security. These are things normal sized people more or less take for granted in the good old USA. But, you quickly remember, this is some island where the laws of physics have been rewritten and giant woman and men prowl around like prehistoric beasties from another epoch. Definitely not your hometown.

For the time being you feel relatively at ease here in the alcove but the fact that Carla lurks nearby, able to pounce when the mood strikes her fancy, has changed the equation. Your loving caring lover has a side that tends toward mischief and you have the aches and pains to prove it.

Suddenly you hit upon it. There must be a hiding place. The old boy Ben thought of everything else, why not a hiding place. Frantically you scurry about and then, when you've just about given up hope of finding your secret lair, you notice that the wall in the bathroom is slightly askew. Pushing it a bit you get it to slide behind the adjoining partition which reveals a set of steps which lead down a foot or so. There is even a flashlight to guide you in the dark. Boy that Ben thought of everything. They then wrap around, doubling back under the bathroom, leading, you think, to under the kitchen.

Before you go any further you go back to the bathroom and put back the wall. What Carla doesn't know won't hurt you you reckon.

Resuming your journey you take about 150 steps before you come to what was obviously Ben's hideaway from Carla. Set in concrete is a not so primitive area with a bed, a light and even a tv. As you study the structure it seems about as Carla proof a spot as your likely to find in the house and you settle in for a nap. Let her worry. This game goes to Brian.
111212112211211112111221111111112211212.title: Brian's Gambit.

1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.content:
In her dressing area Carla began the process of divesting her outfit and settling back into her stand tee shirt and shorts. Looking at her self in the mirror she smiled and had a naughty thought. "I don't need to dress up for him" she smirked. Screw the shirt and shorts. Panties will do fine.

About a half hour after she left Brian at the alcove Carla was back to check on his progress. Noticing the small door was locked she opened the full size door and gingerly stepped in expecting to find Brian either asleep or in the bathroom but she drew a blank. A quick once over revealed no Brian.

Searching the house was no small matter but she covered it fairly quickly and even used a small heat sensing unit she had with no luck. "That bastard found the hiding spot" it suddenly dawned on her.

Going into the basement she lifted out of place and removed the false ceiling tile directly underneath Ben's hideaway. Their rule was that when Ben retreated to the hideaway he was off limits but she had no such rule with Brian and wasn't going to allow him to get the best of her this way.

The concrete bunker yielded quite easily to Carla's tug and she set it down on the table where a little while ago Brian was all tied up. Inside, Brian was sharply awoken and instantly knew he had been found out. Something, perhaps it was just instinct, told him to run out of the bunker. In doing so he ran right into Carla's hand and was snatched up. Lifted up to her face he passed her exposed breasts and was soon staring right into her eyes.

"Were you going somewhere" she asked. "Here I am thinking I've been such a wonderful hostess and all you can think is to run away. My my. What are we to do with you."
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.title: Hideaway Schmideaway.

1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.content:
Placing Brian back down on the table she commanded him to speak as if she were holding an impromptu court session. But nothing came out of his mouth.

"What were you doing? What were you thinking" she asked Brian. After a bit of glaring from Carla he spoke.

"I, I just needed to get away" he said looking down at the ground as if feeling guilty for his actions. "I don't, I don't know if I can explain it."

"Try!"

"Well, the past few days have been the craziest of my life" he said now looking up at Carla. "When I found the secret passage in the bathroom I just got so excited. Like a little kid on a treasure hunt or something. I knew right away this was your husband's hideaway. Maybe...maybe a safety net for him. For me it was, like, I finally am in control. I wasn't running away from you. I was just getting away from being eight and a half inches small. Carla, I just needed some space. I'm sorry if I scared you."

"Well I wasn't frightened. I knew you were in the house. There's no way out. Actually, I was quite impressed with your efforts. You know Ben used to go in there too. That's why he had it built. When he was in there he was off limits. Even though he loved being small, he still needed a place to cool off. Plus, he felt it provided him with a measure of security just in case someone broke in or something. I've never been your size but I think I know a little about what you're going through."

With that Carla leaned in and kissed Brian all over, driving him crazy with passion. With her teeth she carefully picked him up by his short pant leg and then quickly opened her mouth and sucked his body half way in. Brian came in moments and lay limp in her mouth. Removing him from her mouth she carried him to her bathroom where she removed his clothes and lovingly washed him off from head to toe.

As he toweled himself off she decided that it was time he saw some more of the island.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.title: A Mouth Full ofMercy.

choices: Some One New Enters The Scene.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.content:
Carla disappeared for a few minutes and when she returned she had more fresh clothes for Brian and was wearing a hat, a tee shirt, shorts and her birkenstocks.

"I think we could both use some fresh air" she declared and as soon as Brian was dressed she picked him and carried him outside to her golf cart. The golf cart itself was like the others he had seen on the island except directly in front of the steering wheel it had a little captain's type chair for tiny persons. Carla set Brian down in it and he belted himself in.

The tour of the island revealed its natural beauty, its several beaches and even a little bit of forest. It was nice to be out and the fresh air was good.

As they drove along on several occasions people on the island, staffers Brian thought, greeted Carla as Mrs. Stark, as if she held some kind of position of influence. During their hour jaunt they also ran into one of Carla's friends, a tall redheaded woman who didn't even acknowledge that Brian existed during their three minute long conversation. Instead she treated him as if he was part of the golf cart or something, barely even looking at him.

As it was the middle of the afternoon the hot sun and wind took their toll on little Brian and without even asking Carla knew that it was time to return to the air conditioned indoors. When she picked him up to carry him back into the house, all he said was that he was wiped out and wanted to take a nap.

Smiling, she brought him back to the alcove, kissed him good-bye and set him down. Laying on top of the pyramid his mind raced with all he had just seen but he was a bit perplexed. "Mrs. Stark" he thought to himself. He reasoned that was her married name. But the way the half a dozen people they met said it to her, it seemed to carry more weight than just a friendly greeting. And the redhead, she ignored him like he wasn't there. It was all something to think about as he lay down to sleep.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.title: A Tour And A Nap.

choices: Carla Creates a Bit of Mischief.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.content:
Brian's nap lasted until the late afternoon. When he awoke he showered again and put on yet another set of clothes. At this rate, he thought to himself, he'd be through Ben's wardrobe in a few days.

The smell of diner wafted through the house and permeated the alcove. There was nothing like a good smelling meal to get Brian running and he once again found his giant hostess in the kitchen. Taking the elevator to the counter top he expected to find place settings for dinner but instead he found just a newspaper and a can of soda that Carla had been drinking from.

"Hey sleepyhead" Carla greeted him. He looked in her direction and smiled. She had the water running and it would be impossible for him to be heard over that noise anyway.

Brian was at a bit of a loss. Where were the place settings for dinner? Carla realized what he was looking for and pointed in the direction of the dining room. It was dinner time after all and this, apparently, required a more formal setting. That would also explain Carla's long formalish and low cut dress that could barely contain her bust. In it, with her hair swept up, she looked every part the knockout she was.

Like the kitchen the dining room table had its own elevator and Brian was soon staring at an elaborate dinner setting. He was admiring the view when Carla joined him.

"I don't get a chance to use this room very often. I thought we'd be a bit more formal tonight." Brian smiled and remarked "I should have put on my tux." Carla laughed at his remark and informed him that she had several in his size and maybe they would try a formal dinner before he was put back to his normal size.

Dinner was yummy. If he kept eating like this he figured that when he was restored to normal size he probably would weigh a bit more. Maybe two or three pounds. For the first time since he shrank he also had alcohol, in the form of wine. Remembering what had happened the last time he drank, he stopped after what he considered were two normal, for him, glasses.

With dinner over and the sun beginning to set, it was time to consider the evening's activities. The sight of Carla in that stunning spaghetti strap dress was not only a great conversation item but it was driving him out of his mind. So much so that between the dress and the effects of the alcohol, he considered running to her end of the table and leaping into her cleavage.

"So" she said as she placed her chin in her hands and set her elbows on the table, "what shall we do this evening." Speaking in that voice that drove him crazy Carla continued. "Would you like to play another game?"

Practically bursting out of his shorts, Brian frantically bobbed his head up and down yes. As she began to remove the dishes Carla instructed Brian to go to the library and grab a book and start reading. "I'll be along in a bit" she said and disappeared into the kitchen.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.title: Dinner, Then a Game.

choices: Brian Has to Sit and Stew.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.content:
Brian did what a good little man does and followed the orders of his giantess host. Taking the elevator off the table he made a quick bee line for the library.

He had seen the library on his own self guided tour of the house but was still impressed with it on his second visit. The room itself was nearly 500 square feet and had books for every size person. The books consisted mostly of the classics but also contained books that were out of the mainstream.

Brian contented himself to grab a copy of "Moby Dick" and sat down on a tiny couch and began reading. He was about 10 pages into the book when he heard the door open. Glancing up to look at Carla, he nearly fell out of his chair when he saw her.

For this game she had taken it upon herself to play the part of a young Catholic school girl. From the ground up she wore patten leather shoes with buckles, white socks that reached almost to her knees, a green tartan skirt which fell to just above her knees, a white, long sleeved button down shirt and a jacket with a school crest on the left breast.

Walking into the room Carla avoided Brian, not even casting a glance his way. On the desk were some books which she began to put away. Carrying several at a time she meticulously replaced the books on the shelves. After several visits she finally got to tiny size books and moved to where Brian was sitting. The sight of him seemed to take her by surprise (she was acting well).

"And what are you doing here" she inquired of Brian. "I've warned you that the library closes at five, no exceptions."

Brian looked up at Carla who stood menacingly close to him and spoke.

"The door was unlocked. I figured it was open"

"Well you know quite well that it closes at five. You've been warned what would happen if you violated the rules again. I give you an inch and you tiny folks just take a foot. Let's see what Mrs. Fleming has to say about this."

Carla went back to the desk and made an imaginary phone call to an imaginary Mrs. Fleming. Brian couldn't hear the imaginary conversation but when she returned he was in for some not so imaginary punishment.

"It's decided. You've been warned and now it's decided." Suddenly she leaned down and grabbed Brian, holding him quite stiffly in her hand. Holding him just below her face, she walked to the far corner of the room where a victorian style bird cage hung from the ceiling about five feet off the ground. Opening the door she placed Brian inside and then closed the door and locked it by inserting a bar where a lock might have been placed. She turned and left Brian in the corner of the room and resumed her work as he screamed for mercy from his captor. As she set about doing her chores she paid him not the slightest heed.

After a few minutes she left the room, closing the light, leaving Brian all alone to ponder his fate.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.title: Library Punishment.

choices: Brian Visits the Library at Noon.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.content:
The light went back on in the library. It was Carla, still dressed as before, who returned. She walked to the corner of the room where Brian was imprisoned.

"There's been a change in plans" she announced. "Mrs. Fleming called. She had an emergency and can't make it here to pick you up this evening so you're coming with me." Carla opened the door to the cage and easily plucked Brian out, turned and walked out of the room.

Within a minute they arrived in a room that Brian had never seen before. The room was made up to be that of a typical teenager's complete with posters of the latest teen idols. (He would later learn that Carla's niece had spent a summer here with her and had adorned the room to her liking.)

"You'll spend the night here with me. You're lucky, Mrs. Fleming was really mad. I'd have hated to be in your shoes tonight but you got lucky."

"Carla" you interrupt, "I'm really sorry about the rules. I just forgot and... it'll never happen again. I swear."

"Listen, that's what all you guys say, but I'm the one who gets into trouble when you break the rules."

"Please just let me go."

"I don't think so tiny."

"Well you're really a tough girl aren't you. If you weren't so big and fat you wouldn't be so tough."

"Take that back. Take it back."

"No."

"I said take it back."

"No" he repeated, as if intentionally ratcheting up the tension.

"You take it back or else."

"Or else what? What's a little kid going to do to me."

Carla was quite flustered at this point at her inability to get Brian to do what she wanted and seemed on the verge of tears. Stomping her feet she once again demanded an apology but none was forthcoming. Turning away she fell on the bed and started to cry. With that she heard a faint "I'm sorry."

She turned again to see Brian standing on the top of the dresser. He repeated his apology and continued talking.

"I know you're just doing you're job. I'm sorry. You're not fat. Actually you're quite beautiful. Even in that uniform."

Carla blushed, like the schoolgirl she was pretending to be. "Thank you" she said softly, almost embarrassed to be the object of a compliment.

"You really shouldn't be here with me. I'm supposed to make a place for you in my desk drawer until morning. That's what Mrs. Fleming said."

"Please don't. I hate the dark and I hate being confined."

Carla looked down with sympathy on her charge as he looked up plaintively.

"Well" she said as she removed her coat. "I guess we could talk for a while." He smiled and began to tell her how rough it was to be small and to be at the mercy of others. Even nice folks like herself.

She responded by telling him about the difficulties of boarding school. About how lonely she felt, how regimented life was and how things were totally beyond her control. She smiled when she told him that and said "I guess we have a lot in common." They both laughed at the remark and continued to talk. After a while she reached out and stroked his hair and ran her finger down his back. In an instant he responded, bracing himself so that she wouldn't notice the effect she was having on him. But it was too late and she continued to massage him.

"I'd better stop" she said suddenly. It's late and you have to go to sleep. I'll make a bed for you on the floor in a shoebox if you promise you won't run away. He promised and was good to his word. In the morning she released him and said that maybe she'd see him in the library again. This time around noon. He smiled and left her, returning to the alcove to ponder another interesting game.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.title: Night in a Shoebox.

1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.content:
Brian walked into the alcove and had only taken a few steps when he was greeted by a handwritten message on a letter (read normal) sized piece of paper.

"Good morning lover" it started. "Please meet me in the library at noon. I will be out of the house this morning. See you." The letter wasn't signed but was adorned by Carla with the impressions of her lips formed by her when she kissed the paper with her lipstick glazed lips.
In an unseen display of affection, he put his lips to hers and kissed her.

As he got undressed he began to think back to the previous night. It had certainly been interesting, yet frustrating, with no sexual contact other than a short back rub. He wondered what Carla had in store for later as he showered and got dressed.

Hungry he ventured down to the kitchen where a trip to the countertop revealed a continental breakfast complete with his favorite juice and tea. She really did look after him. After breakfast, tv made for a pleasant diversion while he waited for high noon. One movie and some news was enough to kill the time and he headed for the library at 10 to 12.

When he arrived, just a few minutes before 12, she was already there, dressed as she had been the night before. As he entered the room he started to walk toward her and then stopped halfway there and waited for her to notice him. Something on the top of the desk seemed to be distracting her but after a minute she looked his way and came over and picked him up.

"I'm so happy you're here. You're the only friend I have at this school." With that she kissed him on the top of his head and carried him over to the desk.

"I have a surprise for you she announced." Unlike last night she was positively beaming as if proud of some accomplishment. Opening the top side drawer of the desk she picked up a string and as she pulled it out of the drawer it soon became apparent that there was a tiny person attached to it. A very tiny person who's arms Carla had tied behind her back.

"I'd like you to meet someone Brian. This is Mrs. Fleming. The one I told you about last night."

Mrs. Fleming gave an angry look to Carla and began to shout at her.

"Carla" she screamed, almost beside herself with anger. "You are so finished here young lady." She continued to yell, getting the words "when I get" out of her mouth before Carla suddenly swatted her with her hand, knocking her down in the process. Placing her hands on her hips she thrust her chest out, proud of herself as Mrs. Fleming attempted to get up. Brian just stood there, too awed by it all to even move.
1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.title: Mrs. Fleming I Presume.

1112121122112111121112211111111122112121.content:
Eventually Brian looked up at Carla for an explanation to what was happening in front of his eyes. As Mrs. Fleming continued her struggle to get back on her feet Carla began to talk.

Cerese chuckled, “Oh for the first few days I’m sure it’ll be kinky, but there are plenty of couples here that are living that dream. But now that you mention it, I could use some entertainment, I’m assuming you still have a sex drive in spite of your size right?”
Her finger wrapped around Brian’s face effectively gagging him, her big green eyes don’t dart back down to him. Meanwhile his eyes are fixated on her face trying to read what she’s thinking. After walking across the titanic living space to the hearth by the fire place, she finally raises Brian above eye level and his gaze is fixated on her eyes, continuing his analysis. Her other hand’s fingers pulled off his shorts and tossed them over her shoulder, essentially miles away. Now naked she firmly but gently moves him back into a waiting cage on the hearth. She drops him pulling off his shirt and quickly snapping the door shut. It was circular, maybe an inch more in diameter than he was tall, and tall enough for him to stand, but just barely. Brian sits naked and stunned on the bars. Cerese wiggles her shoulders and grins, “I’m going to go out and find a little woman for you to spend the rest of your life with, then you two can get you two lover birds sealed in forever and then you can start entertaining me.” Without another word she turns and walks out of the room.

choices: Drastic measures, try the pin on the door!
111212112222221111112.content: Cerese comes back ten minutes later having changed into a tank top and lounging pants, Brian doesn’t know what to say. “Well? You didn’t try to get out, that’s for sure, I was going to just scare you but maybe I should just leave you in there. What do you say, do you like it in there?” Brian was stunned by this comment, of course living in a cage was not in the ideal ways to live life. “Um…no. I don’t want to live in here for the rest of my life.” Cerese walked around the bar into the kitchen and lost sight of him, “Well then Mr. Brian, I suggest you throw yourself at those bars and get out before I come over to you. Also don’t pull the pin on the lock.” Not wanting to live in this little cage forever, Brian started attacking the bars that made the door of the cage. Shaking, hitting with his shoulder, getting a running start and kicking, trying to bend them. The cage rocked and made a small klink sound audible from the kitchen. A bemused Cerese sauntered back into the living room after hearing this. “You are really giving it the gusto aren’t you Brian?” She mused as approaching and sipping a glass of water. “That’s really too bad, smaller men have been able to get out of that little cage, I guess you don’t really want out do you? Well it’s time, welcome to the rest of your life.” Cerese pulled the neckline on her shirt low enough to display the faintest edge of her areolas, “ya know Brian, you are cute, I don’t think I want to see you having sex with another woman. You are going to spend the rest of your life without ever knowing the touch of another woman, or even sight really.”

1112121122222211111122.content:
Her green eyes pierced the bars like a knife through butter. “Sucks doesn’t it? Knowing that this is the rest of your life?” The cage door gently tinked back and forth with the latch’s minor error for movement . “What are you going to miss more Brian? The feel of a woman, having more than this little cage as your world, clothes? Seriously quit playing, you can get out if you try hard enough.” Brian looked up exhausted and defeated, her eyes beaming down and seemingly burning the energy out of him like summer sun.
Without warning her hand popped the cage open and pulled him out “Did that feel like a good kinky time?” Relief hit Brian like a truck falling off a cliff. “Don’t joke about being subjugated like that, there are probably thousands of little people like you languishing in bondage and forgotten by merciless captors.” Unable to speak Brian just nodded in stunned realization, Cerese picked up his clothes and continued on the path they had originally been on. Again looking over him she spoke “I can virtually guarantee that nobody else will be kind to you while you are here, so don’t dick around. Because I don’t want to be your cage mate, and if I do wind up doing that, you will rue the day you met me.” She entered what Brian assumed to be her room, still speechless.
Upon entering her room the only light came from the only door, no open windows to speak of, she carried him over to her dresser. Her expression had returned to what it had been before she scared him with the cage. “Now we understand each other now right? I’m not going to have to use that to help keep you in line am I?” She pointed without looking to a cage sitting on the floor of her closet. “No, I don’t think you will. I’m not eager to be in one of those again.” She turned her attention to other things, “Good, now I have to go get dinner ready, you will stay in here, and NEVER go outside this room unless I take you, understood?” Brian nodded sheepishly while trying to put his clothes back on.
Without warning a groggy voice called out “Cerese, you home?” She nearly squealed in surprise. Without warning she opened a drawer on the dresser and quickly shoved Brian inside and slammed it shut before he landed. “Uh yes! I am here, just getting out of my sandy stuff, I’ll get dinner going in a few minutes!” Brian lay dazed and in the dark trying to make sense of where he was now. “Good! Bruce and I are awake and hungry. Be a (the voice dragged the next word out) doooolllll and make us something delicious.” The drawer was quickly opened, “Not a sound you hear me Brian? Stay put and stay silent-“
“CERESE! NOW! YOU WILL COME HERE AND START COOKING THIS INSTANT!”
Brian looked up “Right sile-“ he was interrupted by her panicked expression. “SSSHHH!!!” She whispered as strongly as possible. Probably more for her benefit than Brians she picked him up, looked for something to muffle him with, unfolded one of her bras, shoved him into one of the cups, then refolded it pinning him between the two cups, then piled folded up socks and underwear around hit. She shut the drawer quickly and quietly.
It took Brian a second to realized what the blur was, he was now pinned between two lacy feeling bra cups, almost all sound was muffled. The only sound that permeated the imprisoning supportive fabric was a loud clicking sound.
He was now locked inside her dresser. Unable to move or call for help. And only his captor knew he was here. It dawned on him what a helpless situation he was in now. Worse still his immediate bonds were two pieces of fabric that he had spent most of his life cursing for holding back some of his favorite features on women. It was humiliating to find himself, a fully grown man, caged by the cups of a bra, if he were normal size, this bra wouldn’t pose any problem. But now, it was an iron clad inescapable prison. Worse yet, upon his ogling of her breasts, they were so much bigger than his five inch tall self, if those relatively titanic weights were contained by this device, getting out was simply impossible. He could spend the rest of his life trying to wiggle out of their bonds and make less progress than her breast would giggling from a bad step. Finally his struggling only cemented his helplessness as the lace seemed eager to coil itself around his limbs. Maybe the stress had finally snapped in Brian, maybe the sexual tension of this adolescent fantasy caught up with him. Durring his increasingly desperate struggles, Brian had the rude realization that he was interrupted getting dressed, and was left naked. Now the lace had it’s coils around Brian’s erection. The gentle give and take of the material of the cup combated Brian’s self control, it continued to shake gently until he could not hold back any further and climaxed in lacy bondage.
Exhausted and defeated, he eventually collapsed confined in a cage meant for breasts.

After hours and hours of struggling, Brian beings to make some progress
11121211222222111111221.content:
Sudden movement wakes Brian, still bound to the bra. There is a conversation in progress Brian quietly started to listen to. One of the voices was not Cerese’s, the voice was currently lecturing her, “-and another thing, dinner time is five thirty, not five thirty five, not five thirty three, not five any time after thirty! He and I had to WAIT for our meal. Unacceptable Cerese! I don’t know why we are so nice to you. You are pathetic when we-“ the fabric surrounding Brian muffled out the words that followed. Clearly the bra is no longer in the drawer, and the situation seemed to be quite serious outside of it. Brian decided that this would be a very good time to try to get free of his lacy confinement. Much to his surprise success slowly began to follow his efforts. The conversation continued just as one way as he’d heard it before. There was no time to focus on what was happening outside. After a few more minutes and a continuous barrage outside, freedom! The lacy bonds were released and Brian dared a look through the gap between the cups. Just as he lifted one side up, immense pressure landed on him. Through the gap he could see what looked to be the underside of a foot! Whomever was berating Cerese was stepping on him! The lacy confines welcomed him back with a vengeance and twisted around him unforgivingly as the heel twisted above. He could see Cerese and her big green eyes open wide in concern about what awaited her at the hand of this other woman in the room.
“But I was getting exercise, I have to stay in shape, you tell me this ALL the time, I was doing really well and got carried away. I came back as fast as I could, I even got a ride from that creep who won’t leave me alone. I am sorry you two had to wait. I am really sorry, please it won’t happen again.” There was a brief pause and an awkward silence. “Oh I know it won’t, bring me that cage in your closet.” Cerese’s expression changed and she silently obeyed. “Thank you, now strip”. She looked up with a terrified expression, “No way, please. It was just ten minutes!”. Another pause, “Your clothes, off, right now” Cerese obeyed quickly. Revealing a set of boyshorts and a push up bra. A loud snap echoed in the room, “I didn’t say some of your clothes, I said, there you go, good girl” She didn’t wait and finished removing what she had left on.
Cerese’s body was athletic, and trim, not the overly well-endowed body of plastic surgery and wealth that he viewed many of the full size women to possess through the window before. She was very attractive, looking to be maybe mid to late twenties. Her only decoration was the red choker she had been wearing since they met. A grey object fell at her feet, “Put it on, you know what’s coming”. Reluctantly and on the edge of tears she kneeled down and picked it up, it was a collar that she robotically placed around her neck.
Cerese began to shrink, smaller and smaller and smaller. Perspective from between the bra cups was difficult, by the time she stopped, she was maybe a foot tall. The only woman that knew he was here, was now only a foot or so tall. Well below the 18 inch point she mentioned before, if she were captured, who could Brian turn to for help? How would he get out of here? Interrupting his thoughts a long slender French tipped woman’s hand snatched her from the ground, metal clicking sounds echoed in the room, and then she returned locked in the cage and placed on the ground. She was covering herself as best she could and the collar was noticeably missing.
“Ten minutes late just lost you ten inches.” Cerese’s eyes fury replaced the despair, “Seriously? Ten minutes lost me ten inches, that’s ten weeks! This punishment doesn’t fit the mistake and you know it!” The foot on the bra FINALLY left and tapped the cage. “Oh I know it’s not fair, but I don’t have to be fair! We both know it, just be happy you aren’t going to stay this small forever. But I think a few days and the usual punishment will remind you who the boss is.” Cerese’s expression changed from fury to a defeated one. “Do we have to keep doing this? You know how much seeing you two together hurts.” The tall woman purred while her foot kept playing with Cerese’s cage. “I know, that’s why I do it, besides fucking your ex is one thing, riding him in front of you is another, knowing he shrunk you and gave you to me to show just how broken up you two were, is priceless. Unless you would rather not watch, in that case I can throw-“ Cerese had had enough “Don’t throw the shrinking collar away, just fuck him in front of me and get it over with so I can get this over with.”
“Haha if you insist” The cage disappeared in front of him as the woman picked it up out of view. The key and the collar dropped on the floor. “We won’t be needing these for about a week, MY boyfriend is catching more little girls like you to give to me. He’ll be back with all new slaves, until then, I think you can spend some quality time admiring my giant body. Especially how it attracts boys twenty years younger than me.” A week? Cerese’s voice began to get quieter as the pair of giantess and her captive left the room “A week? I can’t be like this a week! I have to-” Laughter drown out the rest of what she was saying. “Nonsense! I just cleared your schedule, after all I own you and can do that. Besides, you can and will be like this a week, that’s what cages lock for! Doesn’t matter what you want. Now should I hang you by my bed, or maybe in my shower but I am kind of loud in there and that might blow out your delicate little ear drums, maybe I should throw you in my sex toy box vibrators that fight back are so much more fun, I could hang you from the tree outside so everyone that comes over can finally see you naked and the little size you should be. Decisions decisions….”
Silence claimed the space. Brian’s existence was clearly secret. Should he try to help Cerese or hide here? First things first, getting out of this tangle of clothes. If Brian can’t do that, then this could be a very long wait.

choices: The Mochidas decide to keep a closer eye on you and keep you to themselves
They give you back to the boy immedately
1112121122222211112.content:
Brian ran as casually as he could so no other beach goers would notice him. Everywhere there were people and there was no way to know who to trust. Any person on this beach could be someone that would help Brian escape, capture Brian and torture him, or simply ignore him as nothing. Where to go? What to do? The sand was becoming hotter and more people were coming to the beach. Every minute that passed stacked the odds against Brian. The sand offered absolutely nowhere to hide, so there was nothing else to do but run for the nearest cover, the bushes and trees between the beach and what looked like a restaurant. Shade and a place to hide, it looked to be miles away but there was absolutely nowhere else to go, he started off hoping against hope that the worst was behind him.

A voice rang out too close to be directed at anyone else, “Hey little dude, what do you think you are doing?” Suddenly the hand of a young woman grabbed Brian from behind and moved him around to view the person who’s hand he was in. She was cute, and immediately started walking, not that Brian noticed while in her hand. “What do you think you are doing?” she repeated. “I’m trying to get away from them, I don’t want to be their boy’s plaything and I can’t talk to any of them, I don’t speak the same language.” Her eyes were somewhat obscured under the bill of her hat and the sun’s brightness but her lips smirked some revealing her indifference. “You don’t speak the same language as your owners? That’s rough little man. Can’t you see how upset you made them, and their kid?” Brian tried not to announce how little he cared but his face gave away his thoughts. “Dude, I don’t know what your deal is with them, but clearly they are worried about you. So I’m going to give you back to them.” Terror struck Brian like a rock falling from the sky and instantly his fight against her grip, however it was utterly futile. “What? No! You can’t! Please don’t! Let me go!” She had begun waving at them with her free arm, “Hey, I’ve lost people here too, I never found out what happened to them, I’d hate to let someone feel the same way I did, you are going back and that’s final.” Her walk began, each step bringing him indifferently back to captivity and humiliation. She didn’t care for his protests and didn’t respond to his pleas.

Without remorse she walked up to the Mochidas, poured the rest of her drink out on the sand, plopped Brian in the pink transparent bottle and screwed the lid back on and handed Brian in his new container to the couple without saying a word, spun on her heel and walked away without showing any signs of remorse.
1112121122222211112.title: ANOTHER BEACHGOER SAW WHAT HAPPENED AND RETURNS...

11121211222222111121.content:
Ayana looked relieved that you had come back into her possession so quickly. After a brief exchange with her husband, which yielded absolutely nothing to Brian, he went back to reading his book and your pink prison was plopped into the sand with enough force to bounce you off the top. Briefly she made eye contact with you, and then returned to her book and ceased paying attention to you.
This went on for over an hour, the sun was boiling, they had set up umbrellas to continue reading in the shade. The pink prison was intentionally left just outside, they were boiling him alive. Finally enough was enough and Brian could take no more, “HEY!” he yelled, nearly deafened by the echo. He tried again while holding his ears. They either didn’t notice him or didn’t care. The heat was oppressive, desperate times call for desperate measures. There has to be a way out of this container. Brian hit the side, it flexed a little and then returned immediately. It was just going to keep popping back no matter how hard he assaulted the side. The lid, the only part that was not permanent. It was an arm’s length above his head, and the sides of this prison were smooth. He jumped feeling a featureless backside of the lid. The heat seemed to intensify, he jumped again with no more success. Maybe if it could be knocked over he could reach, and so Brian began throwing his weight against the walls, but with no success, the sand held the bottle upright. Brian would have lost hope, but it was too hot and he had to try, so he kept at it.
After some time Ayana got up and investigated the rocking bottle, she brought it to her beach chair in the shade and opened the lid. Brian felt the cool air wash over him as if it were a physical wave of relief, the giantess’s face was peering into his prison blankly. She cut her eyes over to her husband and began talking, this was the chance to get out, Brian’s hands reached for the lip of the cup and found it, he hoisted himself up quickly only to find a giant breast in his way and bouncing off of it he fell to the bottom of the cup. Surprised, she clicked the lid back into place leaving the only way of escape sealed.
After some time she took Brian to the nearby restaurant removed Brian and purchased a drink that came in a large bottle and returned to her beach chair. Her husband chuckled and returned to his reading. She unscrewed the cap and took a long drag from the bottle. Placing it in the sand with enough force to keep it upright she returned her attention to Brian, raised an eyebrow and tore his clothes off. She placed the now naked Brian at her feet, he was shocked and tried to cover himself as best he could with his hands. Her toes plunged into the sand a few inches in front of him and dug a small trench. His clothes were tossed into it and immediately the foot smoothed the hole over, burying his clothes in the sand in a hole at least as deep as Brian is tall. Those were the only clothes his size and now they are gone in the sand.
Making things worse, an afternoon breeze was beginning to fling sand, Ayana finished her bottle quickly as her husband began to pack up in response to the wind. Quickly she scooped Brian up and slid him into the opening and screwed the cap back onto the bottle. It was a narrow bottle, his arms were almost pinned to his sides, and they couldn’t reach the cap, his feet might be able to rotate it with enough time. It was eerily silent inside the glass bottle, sound didn’t enter very well, she placed this new prison flat on the ground as they packed up. This was the time to escape, but the bottle was too slippery still to get any friction on the cap. The wind had picked up and a sudden shower had begun. Their remaining beach umbrella fell out of it’s hole knocking Ayana over, and in her attempt to catch her footing knocked the bottle into the hole the other umbrella had occupied. About an inch remained visible on the surface and thankfully Brian was upright. To his horror the loose sand was being blown around his bottle and unknown to the Mochidas, slowly burying it, like an inside out hour glass. They completed packing up, Ayana looked around for the bottle, Brian yelled in fear of being buried alive, but to no avail. Finally she found him, the flat bottom of the bottle being flush with the sand. Brian felt relieved until she stopped moving leaned over the bottle and smiled.

Brian watched as sand completed covering his view, and then nothing happened. He was eager to feel the bottle shaking as it would be pulled from the ground, but nothing. He waited longer, and nothing. He was buried alive, in a bottle, on a beach, with no way to call for help, and only one person knew he was here.

111212112222221111212.content:
Darkness envelops Brian’s entire existence. Silence and stillness. A nightmare of nothing, there is no way to mark the passage of time, or even prove it exists outside the bottle anymore. Immobile, Brian looses track of time and what seem to be still unforgiving days pass.
*Bump*
Something moved the bottle.
Was the tide pulling the bottle out? Was it Ayana to the rescue? Maybe it was the pole from an umbrella or a leg of a chair.
*Bump bump*
Another series of shakes and the slightest beam of sunlight brought reality’s irrepressible brilliance back into Brian’s perspective.
Violent shaking extracted the bottle from the sand. Rocking around in the bottle Brian couldn’t arch his neck far enough back to see who or what extracted him from below the surface
The cap began to twist off and eventually fell off revealing…
111212112222221111212.title: Something else happens

choices: hiding and waiting is the only option for now
there is a plan but it is dangerous
1112121122222211112122.content:
A pair of couples quickly reached in and pulled Brian from the bottle. After so long being able to move again and the sunlight provided a strong disorientation. One of the women who was almost twice as tall as Brian if not more leaned over with harsh morning sun to her back obfuscating her into more of a tall woman shaped shadow. “We have to hurry, can you walk dude?” A shadowed hand steadied his shoulders. Brian’s sense of balance was quickly returning, “I think so, what’s going on?” The couples began to hastily walk across the beach with Brian following closely behind. “We gotta get out of plain sight before we are spotted. You don’t want to trust regulars with your care again do you?” After being pulled from the sand and left to rot in a bottle, Brian didn’t feel inclined to disagree.

The sun hung low on the ocean, it looked like morning was coming lazily to the restaurant, a few scattered people were lazily eating breakfast and reading. Nobody seemed to either notice or car about the group hastily making their way. The man leading the group led them to a stone wall fairly close to the bushes Brian had tried to make his way to last time he ran across the beach. He grabbed the bars covering a drain and with no small effort pulled the whole façade off. “In here man we should be good now”. They all walked into the pipe and the two men pulled the covering back into place. With a satisfied shove they tested their work and found it sound.

They all began walking through the pipes, light coming from any number of inlets, it looked like the pipe was following the wall circling the open air restaurant. One of the couples began chatting to themselves, the other address him, the woman being the same that had previously talked to him. “So how long have you been tiny bud?” She handed him her beach cover up to restore some of his dignity. While walking Brian put it on with a little bit of effort, she was easily twice as tall and her cover up showed it on his tiny frame. “A few days, maybe a week? I’m not sure how long I was down there.” This time the man spoke, “That’d be three days, we had to wait for the pipes to clear before we could come get ya, tropical storms, they come in a hurry and don’t seem to leave quickly here.” Three days? Well it did seem like a long time. “Damn! well thank you for getting me out of there. Where are we going?” The woman spoke again but not turning back to look down. “We are going to where regular people can’t abuse us, you can spend your time there with us away from grabbing hands. It looks like it was a part of the resort that was designed for people about two feet tall a long time ago. Now it just looks abandoned. No regular sized person has been there in our memory so either they don’t know about it or have forgotten about it.” A place away from normal sized people? Fantastic, this would be a good place to wait out a few more days and then get back to the lady in security, resized and then go home.

They kept walking for what seemed to be an hour, steadily going uphill and into one of the buildings. The pipes stayed close the side providing light. During the walk the couple introduced themselves. The woman was Ellen, and the man was Brandon. They were actually younger than Brian by a few years, they had come to the resort as college students. The other couple were Kurt and Jessica, they had met at the resort coming from different walks of life. Finally they made it to their sanctuary. It was a sprawling space, six levels of rooms all stacked in tiers looking over the beach. The rooms backed into a wall, covering the sanctuary was a partly overgrown glass dome covered by a tree. Brian surmised it must be located a little above the arching doorway leading from the restaurant into the hotel. It would be impossible to see from just about everywhere save maybe the beach, and that’s if you knew where to look from the beach. Brian looked back in time to see Kurt pressing a similar kind of grate into their entrance like when they entered their tubular path. “Keeps the rodents out, a rat got in here once, it stayed for a few days, we had to hide out in the rooms for a while. Fun stuff.” Jessica punched him in the shoulder, “Yea for you, my ass hurt for a week with the fun you had.” They all chuckled, Brian lagging behind a second realizing that he was almost half as tall as everyone else there.

Ellen turned to Brian, “So I bet you are starving, Jessica why don’t you get breakfast going?” She hopped up babbling about some new bacon and eggs to herself. Kurt wandered off somewhere, Brandon sat down on next to Ellen and the three of them looked at the sunrise. Brandon brought the conversation back to their predicament. “So you’ve only been tiny for just a few days? Man I don’t think we’ve ever encountered someone so recently shrunk before.” Brian did his best to manage his oversized glass of water and eventually settled for a straw. “Yea, I’m not even supposed to be small, it was some kind of accident.” Ellen snapped her fingers, “I was wondering how you got so small, we are usually as small as they shrink people. Stupidest mistake of my life, letting myself be shrunk.” The sun was higher in the sky now but it couldn’t even be ten in the morning yet, Brian returned the question back to the couple “How long have you guys been shrunk?”. Ellen looked a little defeated but with what looked to be grim acceptance she answered, “We’ve been shrunk for eight years, Kurt and Jessica twelve.” The news made Brian choke on his water. “You’ve been here for eight years like this?!? And those two twelve? How?!?” Ellen kept looking out over the water with a sort of dry indifference in explaining the circumstances that led to her tiny refugee lifestyle, “Brandon and I came with some friends for spring break from college. We all shrank as a dare, turns out shrinking is really expensive, we found out we couldn’t pay too late. They took our things and then sold them to foot the bill, and then they took all of us and sold us for the remainder. We came in a group of about thirty, and Brandon and I watched as they all were sold one by one in the gift shop. We would have been sold too but a kid tried to steal us and let us out by accident. We haven’t seen any of our friends since. Kurt and Jessica were gamblers that lost too much money and got in a similar situation.” This news was a little more shocking to Brian than he had prepared for, the resort selling shrunken people? This is terrible news to hear, especially for someone so much smaller than normal. “So what is the plan? You’ve been here for a long time what are you going to do?"
1112121122222211112122.title: a small group of shrunken people

choices: Brian gets stuck with a single person
Brian gets placed with a couple
11121211222222111121221.content:
Ellen and Brandon looked at each other in disappointment, then Brandon was the first to speak. “We haven’t been able to put anything together. All the methods of restoring size are under very strict control. We have tried before but everyone that gets caught we never see again. Right now, we are just trying to enjoy life as much as we can. We might only be two feet tall but we can still enjoy the sunset from here and enjoy the beach at night. It’s not much, but it beats being bought by a horny teenager and used like a toy.” Ellen waved a hand at the dozens of rooms for two feet tall people, “There are plenty of people here in the same situation, we have our own little community here until we can find a way to escape back to normal size. We’ve wound up becoming quite the group. We have everything from jobless kids to craftsmen and doctors here.“ All in all this didn’t seem like a bad place to be right now, sensing this Brian immediately thought he should stay here “Mind if I hide out here with you guys for a while?”

Ellen nodded “Once you finish your breakfast we can look at getting you some place to stay.” Brian mumbled a thank you while wolfing down the rest of his food. Kurt and Jessica had left by the time Brian had finished, Brandon had gone somewhere toward the far side of the sanctuary. Finally he finished, immediately she got up and stated walking. “Lets find you somewhere to live, would you like your own place, all of the rooms here are for people two fell tall. So…I’m going to say you need to live with someone, sorry dude. Would you like a single person or a couple?” That exact question lead to this mess. Brian was no happier hearing it this time than the first.

Brian’s pace was quick and a little more taxing than he had anticipated “Ellen listen, I just have to hide out a few more days then I’ll be restored and I’ll get out of here. I will be fine by myself for a couple days.” She stopped abruptly and paused. “You can’t even keep up with me walking, you are gonna need your own buddy.“ Enough was enough Brian stood in front of Ellen and stopped her, “No I’ll be ok, I don’t need a chaperone, ever since being shrunk things have gone from bad to worse so can I just have some privacy? I don’t need any help.” Bemused she kneeled down around him and her legs rested on either side of him, she put her hands on his shoulders. “Oh? Don’t need anyone? Then I’ll take this back then.” Quickly she yanked her beach cover up off Brian’s body and put it back on. She stood up stepped over him and kept walking “You sure look like you have things under control.” Having little choice Brian chased after her and hastily demanded something to wear.
