This lady picked him up and took him away from his world. How would he get back to it. His vacation was to last 2 weeks. He was already 3 days into it. Not returning back to work on time would have serious repercussions on his life as if this jam wasn’t enough. Yes an escape was to be his only option here. Hell this woman only ignored him when he first started screaming for release after she imprisoned him in the cell that he now resided in, she sure wasn’t going to help him out of this bind he figured.

Karla continued about a kilometer (.6miles) away from the hotel. There were still many beach goers around but not wall to wall like they were next to the resort. She put down her beach towel and placed Brian’s cage at the head of it in the sand. Karla laid down on her belly with her face no more than 6 inches (15centimeters) from the cage. Karla smiled and regarded her sulking prisoner. “You know little man I’m not such a bad gal as long as you don’t cross me, and I could make your time here pretty interesting if you know what I mean.” Brian retorted with a “No I don’t know what you mean!” and then faced away and looked off into the distance. Then he heard the cage door bolt being unfastened. She opened the door and smiled again. “I’ve been thinking, maybe your not a little pervert after all and I’ve been being a little harsh with you. Maybe we could look for your clothes again in a little while and find your wallet. I’m starting to believe that maybe you’re a nice little guy after all.”

Brian saw a window of opportunity open itself. He wasn’t going to waste time and see it close again either. “Of course I’m a nice guy. I told you that woman played a cruel joke on me and now I just want to go home. What’s your name by the way?” “Karla.” “Oh yeah that’s a nice name, I’m really glad that you didn’t squash me or something you had me really scared earlier.”
Karla answered; I’m kind of sorry about that but when I was a girl a man exposed himself to me in a park and I’ve always been really hostile towards things like that you know.”

Brian: “Yeah I see your point”
Karla: “ I’m glad you do”
Brian: “ No problem, hey is there anything I could do for you before we go look for my cloths?”
Karla: “ Well if you don’t mind maybe I could put you on my back and you could rub my neck, It get’s so sore these days, must have been all of that dancing I did last night.”
Brian: “ Sure my pleasure”

Karla gently took Brian up in her hand and deposited him on her back. She put her arms at her side and closed her eyes wondering if she would even feel the man up there. Brian for his part was impressed with the softness of her skin and yet sufficiently taut enough to yield very little. Brian bent down and tried to use his arms. This only elicited a slight giggle from Karla. Angering him from laughing at his impotence he began jumping up and down on her neck to see if this did any good. To which he was rewarded with a Oooh sound. Encouraged he settled into a routine almost like skating in place or hopping side to side pushing yards of skin with each thrust. After about 10 minutes of this Karla was out like a light.

Yes! He thought.


Brian decided to:
111222211211222.title: Massaging a real woman

choices: Karla has returned looking for her little man
Nicki's mother has awaken to find this spectacle unfolding
1112222112112221.content:
Brian gingerly climbed down her shoulder and leaped onto the sand. Swinging his head side to side he scanned for the hotel. Seeing it way off in the distance he began to trot off towards his hopeful salvation. Looking back over his shoulder he kept having to reassure himself that the colossus would not get up and spring after him.

It was on the 3rd glance back over himself that he ran smack into an outstretched palm. “Cool look Nicki I caught him.” Brian was engulfed in a hand and hoisted up into the air. He would have struggled more if he could only move his arms and legs but as it was he could only gasp for air in its firm embrace. Candy ran over to her friend whom had just leaned up from their beach towel to see what her friend was talking about. Candy ran over to her friend and jumped down on the towel to present her prize. Nicki looked back at her mother who was still dozing more than 15 feet (3meters) away. Nicki looked at her friend again and covered her mouth to stifle a loud giggle.

Candy placed the tiny man on the wide colorful towel and exclaimed; “It’s the little man from this morning, remember? But now it looks like he’s wearing diapers!” The 2 teenage girls erupted in a fit of laughter. Brian whom had been placed on the towel in a prone position lifted himself up. Seeing a big gap between them he sprung towards it. He made it about 12 steps before being swatted backwards onto his back by Nicki. “Whoa were do you think your going you little pipsqueak?!” Brian could hear them giggling from above through his dazed and ringing head. He had thought that he’d been hit by a car with her gentle swat. “Hey let’s torture him some what do ya say Nic” “Sure I’ll grab his hands and you get his legs so we can tickle him crazy!”

The 2 humored titanesses pulled him spread eagle and began to deliver the worst tickling of his life. Candy would use her long brunette hair to feather his feet while Nicki dug under his arm pits with her index fingernail. Brian convulsed and pulled with all his might and this only seemed to amuse them more. Brian’s world became a sea of laughter, tickling, laughter, and more tickling. When the 2 girls mercifully tired of this antic Nicki had an idea.

“Hey let’s play sand man with him.” Candy’s eyes went large and wide as she responded with an elated; “Yaaah!” Nicki scooped out a handful of sand and dropped the moaning and disorientated man into it. Both girls quickly pushed the sand back together effectively immobilizing him. They both propped themselves on their hands and elbows and smilingly regarded their tiny prisoner who only had a head sticking out of the sand..

Nicki; “Hey Candy maybe we can sneak him home and keep him.”
Candy; “Sure but he stays at my house because I found him.”
Nicki; “No, he stays at mine because my mom payed for you to come here with me.”
Candy; “Oh Nicki you go find your own little man, he’s mine”
Nicki; “Let’s use my deck of cards, high card wins him, deal?
Candy; “Deal.”

Nicki got up and went over to her duffle bag and started rummaging through it. Meanwhile Candy amused herself by squeezing his cheeks and ruffling his hair. Brian began demanding release when Candy simply put her index finger over his mouth and shooshed him. Candy giggled some more as the enraged man muffled obscenities into her digit. Nicki returned and both girls faced each other and sat indian style readying themselves for the card draw.

Brian couldn’t believe his bad luck, here he is the future of his life about to be decided by stupid card game by a young teenage girl. It was after the card deck had been shuffled and they were about to begin when a shadow fell over Brian:
1112222112112221.title: Winner takes all

choices: Take him back to the hotel for some disciplining
Go over to the hotel pool to play with him over there
11122221121122211.content:
Karla woke up about 15 minutes later. The first thing she realized was that her little man was nowhere to be seen. With a huff she got up and started scanning the sand for him. Walking in the general direction of the hotel she came upon the two teenage girls whom she had seen earlier in the morning. Karla walked right up to them and started to ask them if they had seen her little man when both girls gasped and said in unison: “Watch your step!” Karla looked down in between her feet and saw Brian’s head desperately trying to wiggle out of the sand. Karla grinned and knew just how to extract him. Removing her foot from her flip flop she slowly dropped her toes on top of his head and wrapped them around it. Then slowly lifting it Brian was pulled out as if a crane had lifted him.

Brian felt the warm flesh land on his head. It then surrounded it trapping his face in a hot smelly prison. Not being able to see anything and simultaneously suffocating he felt the pressure of his head being torn off his shoulders. Then mercifully the sand yielded and he was hoisted up into the air where Karla’s awaiting hand snatched him from her flexed foot.

Karla addressed the girls: “Ok little ladies I’m going to be taking my husband back now.” Candy protested; “But he didn’t seem like your husband this morning.” Karla sighed and lied some more; “ Dear, we were roleplaying this morning, one day when your older you’ll understand about such things.”

Karla turned and walked back towards her towel. Candy inquisitively looked to Nicki whom pretended that she knew all about such things. “Sure I know about roleplaying my mom and dad do it all the time.” Nicki pushed her chin up in the air giving Candy an I’m more sophisticated than you look.

Karla retrieved her towel and cage. Before she tossed Brian back inside she let him know about the jam he was now in.

“I can’t believe that I trusted a little slime ball like you. You’ve been lying to me all along. Now your really going to get it Mr. Brian was stuffed back in the cage and Karla began to walk.
11122221121122211.title: Karla returns to  fetch her man

choices: Karla takes the exhausted little man back to her suite
Karla has more molestation in mind
111222211211222112.content:
Karla walked on rather briskly and didn’t mind jostling the cage along the way. She figured it would be good abuse for him after the stunt he had tried to pull. Brian was on a roller coaster ride with speed bumps thrown in. Bounce, fall, slide, bang, “Ohww”bounce, fall, slide, bang. After about 15 minutes of this rocky ride Brian’s world slammed down to a halt.

On a concrete surface he beheld Karla’s 8feet long foot. It bend and flexed at the ankle and then his cage door bolt was being unfastened. He heard feminine talking above. “Hello Karla how you been? What you got down there a pet man? Can I see him?”. “Sure you can I was just getting ready to cool him off along with myself want to join us? “Sure hun let’s get wet.”

Brian’s door was pulled open and in came the hand. Brian braced himself before he was jerked out of the cage. Karla brought him up to chest level and began explaining to Teresa that she had found a new boyfriend whom was into being dominated and abused. Teresa put her hand over her pretty middle aged mouth and bequeathed that surly he couldn’t be into such things. To which Karla kept a finger planted over his mouth and replied that he most surely was. And that he had a fetish for begging for release and trying to get away and that he absolutely adored being caught and punished. Teresa laughed and shook her head as the two ladies walked down the pool steps and waded into the cool crystal clear water.

Karla went on; “I thought I would bring him down to the pool and play water monster do you want to help me?” To which the blonde haired beauty replied; “Oh neat sure I would!” Teresa looked down and the now very nervous Brian whom Karla had by now unblocked his mouth. Then Teresa began to growl and show her teeth at Brian, raising her hands in a threatening manner. Brian shook his head and began to try to reason with the lady as a giggling Karla began to lower him into the pool water.

“Lady, you got to understand, I’ve been kidnaped, I’ve been shrunk against my will, I’ve been” Splunk! Brian was dropped into the water . Both ladies waited for him to surface so that they could pounce. As soon as he did Karla made a roaring sound and slapped the water right beside him burying him in a tidal wave. Both ladies began laughing hysterically as the games began. Brian would emerge and gulp in a precious gasp of air and then be dunked by a waiting finger of thumb. At one point while he was desperately swimming towards the pool edge Teresa got up on the surface and told Karla to “Watch this.” Teresa leaped up into the air and curled her legs together with her arms and did a cannon ball right next to Brian. Brian heard and then felt the thunderous Boom. First he was pushed to the right and then he was pulled straight down with the gigantic undertow. Brian spiraled down and down only to be collected by Teresa whom shot them both back up to the surface of the water. Teresa emerged with Brian held over head and asked Karla to top that. Brian was no longer pleading but just gasping for life sustaining air.

Karla gave a holier than thow smile and said; “Hand me the little runt, I know just what to do.” Teresa complied after giving Brian a sympathetic kiss on the head and Karla took him away. She stuffed him right in between her luscious c-cup boobs and took the ladder out of the pool. Brian saw the direction that they were going and began to shiver with fright.

Now Karla was going up another ladder. The ladder of the high dive board! They got to the top and Karla warned him; “ If you survive this I’ll give you a little break, how’s that sound?” Brian just stared at the water that seemed hundreds of feet below. Karla raised her arms and jumped up on the board. Bouncing once she sprung higher up into the air. Teresa gasped at the spectacle and was genuinely concerned for Brian’s safety at that point but it was too late now. Karla flew up into the air and did a graceful swan dive. The water blasted through her cleavage. Her breast just protected his head enough as they compressed together. Karla went 10 feet (3.2meters) under the water and using momentum shot towards the other end of the pool. Karla was an experienced swimmer and knew how to swim under the water and hold her breath. And swim under the water she did. Brian had the sensation of being tied to the belly of a nuclear submarine as this massive lady propelled them further and further. Brian’s lungs were bursting with the pain of CO2 back up and the lack of new oxygen. Brian’s eyes began to see stars as his consciousness began to fade.

Karla came up to the surface when her hand had touched the wall of the far side of the pool. Winded herself she was breathing heavily. Looking down at her breasts Brian’s head was wobbling back and forth as he tried to shake himself back to consciousness. Karla happy that her swimming prowess had delivered the 2 of them relatively unscathed waded over to Teresa.

“Well Teresa thanks for helping me with Brian but as you can see I thinks it’s time I gave him a little rest. Teresa bent over to closely inspect Brian. Karla told him to wave goodbye to her friend. Brian could only manage a half wave before he dropped his arm again along with his head which he no longer had the strength to hold up. Teresa shook her head and remarked how she couldn’t believe how perverted some guys are.

Karla responded with; “Yeah you can say that again!”
111222211211222112.title: Sea Monsters

choices: Brian double backs to Karla's suite.  "That was a bad idea!"
Brian tries to outsmart them in the service room
1112222112112221121.content:
Up the elevator they went and back into her room they arrived. Karla sat Brian’s cage down on the bed and then took him out. Smiling down at her exhausted man she chided; “More fun in one day than you deserve huh?” Brian could only moan and allow her giant hands to manipulate his tiny body. Karla took him over to a tall drinking glass standing on her dresser and stood him inside of it. Brian was bewildered with this latest ploy. More so when she began dumping a bottle of mineral water into it. “You can wash off in this. I’m not ready for you to take a shower with me yet you little perv.” And with that she went over to the bathroom and shut the door. Brian heard water begin to run after a few seconds.

Mustering up his last reserves of strength Brian jumped to the lip of the glass and caught on with both of his hands. Pulling up and over he was thrilled with her miscalculation of his energy levels and managed to tilt the entire glass over causing a rush of water to go over the dresser ledge. Brian crawled out of the glass and looked around for his escape route. The light cord was his best hope and he slid down it in his wet gauze diapers.

Landing on the blue carpeted floor he immediately ran over to the door. Fate was shining on him or so he thought when a knock came at the door and from far above when he heard; “Housekeeping, coming in.” Brian waited by the door opening. He heard her enter the master security code and open the door swung.

In flung a white tennis shoe as big as a car. Up the stocking leg he looked to see it attached to a blue cleaning uniform that wrapped around a short stocky middle aged Hispanic lady. In she came pulling a cleaning cart behind her. Wasting no time Brian ran out and looked both ways. First left then right then “Shit!” Another cleaning lady who was staring wide eyed at him. Then she began to smile.

Brian took off running towards the ice and vending machines. The middle aged Hispanic lady whom had just spotted him called out to her work mate. “Pricilia come out here quick. There is a little man running down the hall help me catch him.” Pricilia poked her head out of Karla’s room and then immediately gave chase with Lucinda. Brian couldn’t believe it. Now he was being chased by two heavy set middle aged Hispanic ladies whom were going to do God knows what after they had caught him. Both seemed thrilled and over eager to capture him which worried him all the more.

Brian ran desperately with his last vestiges of strength into the service room feeling the vibrations of the huge pursuing behemoths. He saw the ice machine and decided to run under it as it was his only hope. They both came pounding around the corner. Their momentum caring them past Brian’s hiding spot for just a second.

If Brian stays put he figures he can eventually get completely away and regain his freedom. He also sees his brief window to get back to the safety of Karla’s suite not risking uncertain capture. It would be a hell of a lot more pleasant with Karla than with those 2 ogres if he failed.

Brian had a very difficult choice to make and neither one was entirely enticing. Which did he decide to do?:
1112222112112221121.title: Maids

11122221121122211212.content:
Brian could easily crawl around under the ice machine. Sweating and breathing hard from his latest spring we watch the massive tennis shoes move to and fro. He couldn’t make out their Hispanic conversation but it didn’t take a lot of imagination to figure that they were coordinating their search. One maid looked under the soda machine while the other (Priscilla) bent down and began peering under the ice machine. A huge eye searched his hide out. It swept back and forth. Then seemed to settle on his position.

Brian stopped breathing as he tried to stay as still as possible. “Lucinda, I see the little man he be under here, get your broom hominose! (quickly!). Brian heard the other giantess stomp off to her cleaning cart. Brian had underestimated their advantages and the ease at which he could be found and routed out. Meanwhile Priscilla tried to coax Brian out the easy way; “Come out little man, we not going to hurt you. We going to take care of you. Come here, it is ok little one.”

Priscilla looked back as Lucinda got down on her belly and began slowly sliding the broom handle towards little Brian. Brian saw the telephone pole sized handle slide with ease across the floor inching ever so closer. He also could see that Priscilla was keeping a watchful eye on him as well waiting to snatch him as soon as he was flushed out.

The pole moved past him and then started to shift to the left corralling him forward. Both ladies began to smile as they knew now it was just a matter of time before they had captured their new toy.

All three heard a noise:

Choice A: The cleaning ladies get up to talk to someone whom has entered the cleaning room.

Choice B: It’s the ice machine, Brian is captured
11122221121122211212.title: Minorities aren't as so stupid

choices: Brian is Taken by Ms. Winthrop
Brian Ends UP at Security HQ
111222211211222112121.content:
Suddenly an abrupt noise interrupted the cleaning ladies' fun. They turned to see who or what it was and saw the rather lanky form of Phyllis Winthrop standing at the door.

"What's going on in here" she asked somewhat sternly, in a manner which suggested she had a sense of what was going on. Lucinda volunteered that they had seen a little man and were trying to coax him out when Ms. Winthrop entered the room.

The director of hotel services Ms. Winthrop was an imposing figure at the resort. She stood a shade over six feet tall and was a veritable giantess to the smaller Hispanic cleaning ladies.
"I'll deal with this" she said and the two cleaning women were swiftly on their way, disappointed that their fun had been ended but lucky that they had escaped with nothing more than a verbal reprimand.

Ms. Winthrop summoned security to the room which swiftly had Brian out from his hiding place and placed in a small cage. "We'll take it from here" said the shorter of the two security guards to Ms. Winthrop. With that they exited the room with Brian in the cage.
111222211211222112121.title: Caged by Security

choices: It may be better to stop tempting fate
1112222112112221121212.content:
After a lengthy ride in the cage on the lap of one of the security ladies, he arrives back at Security HQ. The two guard ladies had collected quite a few shrunken people on the way, all less than two feet, packed into small cages or shackled to chain behind the golf cart. They cage’s shaking kept Brian from getting a good look for the majority of the ride. Most of the captives were male, some were female. All of the shrunken people were carried/lead into the building and sorted according to size.
The entire time no one had addressed him, and Brian was beginning to dislike being treated as a non entity again. His cage, and the cage containing about a dozen men and women about his size sat on a steel table deep inside waiting for something unknown to happen. Brian looked at the cage and found two people clearly panicking about their situation pleading with the crowd to help get the door open so they could escape. There was some reaction form the crowd but nothing could be done because the door was on the top of the cage and well out of anyone’s reach. Two hours pass and there is no one to explain what will happen next and no escapes from the neighboring cage.

Finally the same pair of ladies walk in. “So sorry to keep you waiting folks, duty calls. We will do what we can to get you back to where you belong.” A third much younger lady walks in. Probably barely 20 years old with short blonde hair. “Ok so….send each guest down the chute….into their own module….and then ask the questions right?” The taller brunette began looking into the cage with people in it and picked the two out who were distraught about their situation, a man who is clearly and if not more an inch smaller than the other six inch occupants and a young woman with platinum hair and a very fiery attitude. “That’s right except for these two.”

“Ok I know this, the little guy there, he’s smaller than six inches, so he has to go to…legal. I don’t know about the girl. Is it-” Without a word the brunette slides the man into the left side of her bra “um…can you do that? We are on the clock.” The brunette proceeds to button her uniform back up clearly ignoring muffled protests coming from within. “It’s the last nice thing he’s going to experience for a while, so I don’t think he’ll mind too much. Now this little harlot here is totally screwed. Helen, could you hand me one of the doll boxes from the cabinet over there?” While the second guard of the two walked over to a cabinet and produced a box, the brunette forcefully removed the cover up, shoes, and purse from the platinum haired girl leaving the blue bikini intact. The doll box was placed on the table right after the stripping had completed and the girl began to fight like her life depended on it. Helen lifted the box up and a wide disk with two poles on opposite sides with restraints hanging off of each remained. Without a care in the world the girls arms and legs were restrained leaving her standing with her arms and legs spread. She yelled at the brunette and savagely yanked on the restraints. Clearly to no avail.

The brunette spun the platform around to show all the captives the girl’s panicked expression. “Alrighty everyone pay attention. What’s your name doll?” She pokes the girl in the pack sending her forward to the max length her restraints will take her. “My name is Laney you colossal bitch, let me go!” Amused the brunette turned back to the caged crowd. “Ok everyone this is Laney, and she is a sad story. She came here with her boyfriend and they both got shrunk and placed in the care of another woman. He fell in love with his keeper and dumped Laney here. He went back to his keeper’s home in a little cage and didn’t bother to pay his hotel bill. Laney here didn’t have any money to get resized or pay her bill. While waiting for this mess to get cleared up she forgot she’s only a sad six inches tall and must obey the rules for girls only six inches tall and begins to walk around the resort like she’s normal. All of you are here because we caught you walking around unescorted by someone taller than two feet. This is a big big no no. Now she is the only fourth strike in the cage I am sure so none of you have to worry about this, I know some of you have been caught twice before and I’ll deal with you soon enough. Laney here is special, so special, such a special little rich girl. First strike, is no big deal, we’ll return you to your room, or owner, or keeper, cage, or whatever, we’ll put you back where you belong no big deal after a forty eight hour processing period. For you second strikers, you are going to be kept at the pound, for at least two weeks. No excuses, it’s the rules, and you will learn to obey them while you are behind bars, and you will stay behind bars for at least two weeks. If someone comes to claim you or your stay at the resort is up then you can leave, otherwise you’ll spend two more weeks learning the rules. Then we will let you go back to where you belong. This is where some of you are going after this meeting, don’t bother protesting, it’s going to happen. Just memorize the rules and follow them when you get released and you won’t have to worry about it again. For the third strike the punishment is much more severe. Isn’t that right Laney?” A slur of flailing and curses erupted form the young woman restrained to the poles “Six months in the pound to drive home the rules. I know it’s severe but it’s important. Only a few souls have been subjected to this. And then we suspend your privileges to restore your height and or leave the resort. You will spend another six months trapped here as tall as you are now, to show you understand the rules. You also will have to work for the resort to offset the money and time we are taking to ensure your safety and understanding of the rules. Finally there is the fourth strike. Such as little Laney here. Clearly some people just cannot deal with where they are in life, so we just have to get rid of them. Little Laney here doesn’t have any rights and is going to be sold in the specialty gift shop. Probably by the end of the day, there is a seventeen year old boy that asks every few days if she will be for sale. I’m going to call him when I leave this room and let him know she is up for sale now. How else are we supposed to recoup the costs of trying to ensure her safety? Now we are not doing this to be cruel or mean, it’s for your safety. These rules are iron clad so be sure to obey. Poor Laney here is only a nineteen year old girl, she came here on her eighteenth birthday a free girl, and is going to be leaving probably tomorrow as a plaything. If she obeyed the rules she probably could have left when she turned twenty at height women are supposed to be instead of the half a foot she will be leaving as.”

Not a sound was coming from either of the cages. In spite of Laney’s flailing her bikini was torn off and thrown with the rest of her cloths into the trash can, the box restored around the platform and sealed up. The clear front displayed her naked defiance to everyone but muffled her words to a barely audible blur. Helen easily picked up the box as if it had a regular doll instead of a human being inside of it and left to take her to the gift store. The brunette got up to leave and with a simple “I hope I don’t see you later” followed by a wink, left the room.

All eyes focused on the remaining blonde woman. “Ok little guys and gals, lets get you where you are supposed to be.” Without a real regard for the fact there was someone in the cage, Brian’s was picked up, the top opened and he was slid head first into her hand. She removed his clothes, locked a collar around his neck and then dropped him into a funnel built into the desk. Down a series of tubes, and into a small metal box through it’s ceiling. Brian found the entire floor to be cushioned, as were the walls. Baring the one wall that was entirely a window. Looking around there was a small indention in the wall for what looked to be food, and a small spot for the utilities of a bathroom. A moment later the hole in the ceiling he came through snapped shut.

Presumably after the rest of the caged people were treated similarly, the blonde’s face reappeared. “Alrighty hun, what is your name?”
“Brian Miller, um, what is yours?”
“Brian Miller…there collar 2309…my name is Susie, thank you for asking Mr. Miller”
“Is all this necessary? Can I have my clothes back?”
“I’m sorry Mr. MillerI can’t do that, I don’t make the rules I just follow them”
“What about this collar, I am not an animal”
“Again, sorry Mr. Miller, it’s used to track you little guys until we are sure you go where you need to go, then we will take it off”
“I guess you can’t just drop me off at my room and make me big again can you?”
“Sorry sir, we have to make sure you aren’t someone’s escaped property first, require some form of discipline, or have an outstanding credit somewhere. Then we can look into returning you to your room. You will have to talk to guest services about being restored to your normal height.”
“I’m not anyone’s property and as far as I understand I am in good standing, can we speed this along.”
Sue rolls her eyes “Mr. Miller, I just enforce the rules, I don’t get to pick and choose them.”
“Let me out of here Sue, I haven’t done anything wrong”
“Would you like me to put you down as a second strike sir? You seem like you could benefit from an education about following rules.”
1112222112112221121212.title: Brian Ends UP at Security HQ

choices: One of the captives fights back
Someone full sized enters the room
11122221121122211212121.content:
Susie’s eyes beamed her genuine annoyance right into Brian with their gaze. This was not the look of a girl who was interested in a tiny man’s protests, time to capitulate.
Forty eight hours was nowhere near as bad as a month.

“Ok, ok, I’ll wait it out. Being locked up here can’t be too bad.”

“It’s not, all the things that happen to you little people out there make this cell seem like a vacation. I hope you enjoy your stay here Mr. Miller. Besides, your name peopled up in the system you don’t have anything to worry about.”

Susie picks up the cell from under the table and lifts it to a vacant slot on the wall. A wall that contained slots for probably hundreds of other cells, presumably all occupied by shrunken people in similar predicaments.

With nothing else to do Brian walks to the glass wall and looks out into the room. The view was bland, to the left, the room went on for what seems to be a few more feet before ending in a wall with a door. Across was another wall with a door, this wall appeared to be where the slots for cells started on the opposite side of the room and continued to Brian’s right out of his sight. This was indeed a pound. Each cell had glass window in front, below it was hand written the pertinent information about it’s occupant.
